ygData.subject: Re: Tinkering and raising skill level
ygData.msgSnippet: I also spent over 100PP without a single point advance. The GM I petitioned said it had recently come to their attention and was being addressed... whatever
ygData.messageBody:
I also spent over 100PP without a single point advance. The GM I petitioned said it
had recently come to their attention and was being addressed... whatever that means.
Until it's fixed Tinkering is pretty useless. I'd love to make some of the harder
items but don't really have 1000's of plat to throw around.

Focasa

22 Wizard
Fennin Ro

catbik@... wrote:

> From: catbik@...
>
> Ok.
>
> I've spent way over 100 plat making flameless lanterns which is the ONLY thing
>
> that I can make easily that Is not trivial.. However..
>
> My tinkering skill level has not gone up 1 point! Is anyone else having this
>
> problem?
>
> Also I hate how half the items are bugged!
>
> Where can I get that Gnomish tattered cloak to make the Heated cloak?
>
> Collapsable fishing poles are a pipe dream, along with spyglasses, Infravision
>
> goggles and gnomish fireworks...
>
> I encourage ALL of you to email Verant or do a (few) /feedback's in game stating
>
> that you want Tinkering fixed, like I have.
>
> -Catbik
>
> Floating Merchants
>
> Bertoxxulous
